title: Final Fantasy X
curated_desc: One of the most beloved JRPGs ever. Incredible story, memorable characters, and deep turn-based combat.

title: Final Fantasy XII
curated_desc: Strategic, MMO-inspired combat with the Gambit system. A more mature, political story set in Ivalice.

title: Kingdom Hearts
curated_desc: Disney meets Final Fantasy. Charming crossover with surprisingly deep action combat.

title: Kingdom Hearts II
curated_desc: Refines everything from the first. Some of the best action combat on PS2.

title: Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty
curated_desc: Postmodern stealth masterpiece. Controversial at launch, now considered ahead of its time.

title: Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater
curated_desc: Often called the best in the series. Cold War jungle stealth with incredible boss fights.

title: Shadow of the Colossus
curated_desc: Nothing but massive boss fights in a hauntingly empty world. A genuine work of art.

title: ICO
curated_desc: Minimalist escort puzzle game. Atmospheric, haunting, and unforgettable.

title: Devil May Cry 3: Dante's Awakening
curated_desc: The blueprint for stylish action games. Tight combat, style switching, brutal difficulty.

title: Ratchet & Clank
curated_desc: Platforming with absurdly creative weapons. The trilogy starter.

title: Ratchet & Clank: Going Commando
curated_desc: Bigger, better, more weapons. Peak PS2 platforming.

title: Ratchet & Clank: Up Your Arsenal
curated_desc: Perfected the formula with online multiplayer.

title: Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy
curated_desc: Bright, colourful collectathon platformer from Naughty Dog.

title: Jak II
curated_desc: Darker, open-world sequel with guns and hover vehicles.

title: Jak 3
curated_desc: Desert wasteland setting, refined combat, satisfying conclusion.

title: Sly Cooper and the Thievius Raccoonus
curated_desc: Stealth platforming with cel-shaded style and great characters.

title: Sly 2: Band of Thieves
curated_desc: Open hub worlds and multiple playable characters.

title: Sly 3: Honor Among Thieves
curated_desc: Biggest roster of playable characters, heist missions.

title: God of War
curated_desc: Brutal, cinematic Greek mythology action. Massive set pieces.

title: God of War II
curated_desc: Bigger, more epic sequel. One of the best PS2 games full stop.

title: Burnout 3: Takedown
curated_desc: Arguably the best arcade racer ever made. Crashes are half the fun.

title: SSX 3
curated_desc: Open mountain snowboarding with incredible flow and a killer soundtrack.

title: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
curated_desc: Massive open world across three cities. RPG elements and endless content.

title: Resident Evil 4
curated_desc: Redefined third-person action. Tense, replayable, and endlessly influential.

title: Silent Hill 2
curated_desc: Psychological horror at its absolute peak. The story will stay with you.

title: Silent Hill 3
curated_desc: More visceral than SH2 with stunning visuals. Direct sequel to SH1.

title: Persona 3 FES
curated_desc: JRPG meets life sim. Dark themes, incredible music, deep social links.

title: Persona 4
curated_desc: Murder mystery meets high school sim. Warmer tone, equally addictive.

title: Dragon Quest VIII
curated_desc: Classic JRPG comfort food with gorgeous cel-shaded visuals.

title: Shin Megami Tensei: Nocturne
curated_desc: Brutally atmospheric demon-collecting RPG. Post-apocalyptic Tokyo.

title: Yakuza
curated_desc: Where the series started. Rough but fascinating crime drama.

title: Yakuza 2
curated_desc: Bigger, better sequel. Kamurocho and Sotenbori.

title: Radiata Stories
curated_desc: Almost every NPC can join your party. Branching paths and charm.

title: God Hand
curated_desc: Clover Studio's last game. Absurd, punishing cult classic.

title: Odin Sphere
curated_desc: Gorgeous Vanillaware 2D action RPG with interwoven stories.

title: Dark Cloud 2
curated_desc: Dungeon crawling meets city building meets golf. Genuinely unique.

title: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker
curated_desc: Cel-shaded Zelda that aged better than anything from its era.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
curated_desc: Darker, more traditional Zelda. Epic dungeons and wolf transformation.

title: Metroid Prime
curated_desc: First-person exploration masterpiece. Atmosphere through the visor.

title: Metroid Prime 2: Echoes
curated_desc: Darker sequel with light/dark world mechanic. Underrated.

title: Super Smash Bros. Melee
curated_desc: Still played competitively 20+ years later.

title: Resident Evil
curated_desc: Gold standard of survival horror remakes.

title: Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door
curated_desc: Funny, creative turn-based RPG. One of Nintendo's absolute best.

title: F-Zero GX
curated_desc: Blindingly fast futuristic racing. Brutal difficulty, incredible spectacle.

title: Super Mario Sunshine
curated_desc: Tropical Mario with FLUDD water pack. Divisive but charming.

title: Luigi's Mansion
curated_desc: Ghost-hunting with a vacuum. Cozy and atmospheric.

title: Star Wars Rogue Squadron II: Rogue Leader
curated_desc: Stunning arcadey Star Wars flight combat.

title: Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem
curated_desc: Sanity effects break the fourth wall in wild ways.

title: Tales of Symphonia
curated_desc: Great entry to the Tales series with real-time combat.

title: Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance
curated_desc: One of the best in the series. Permanent death stakes.

title: Animal Crossing
curated_desc: The one that started it all in the West.

title: Baten Kaitos: Eternal Wings and the Lost Ocean
curated_desc: Card-based combat with stunning pre-rendered backgrounds.

title: Chibi-Robo!
curated_desc: Tiny robot doing chores. Sounds boring, is incredible.

title: Skies of Arcadia Legends
curated_desc: Air pirate JRPG with ship battles. One of the best of its era.

title: Custom Robo
curated_desc: Deep mech customisation with addictive arena battles.

title: Gotcha Force
curated_desc: Toy battler that's perfect for emulation. Wild, chaotic fun.

title: Final Fantasy VII
curated_desc: The RPG that changed everything. Iconic characters and that twist.

title: Final Fantasy IX
curated_desc: A love letter to classic FF. Charming, beautiful, deeply emotional.

title: Final Fantasy Tactics
curated_desc: Deep political story with incredible tactical combat.

title: Metal Gear Solid
curated_desc: Cinematic stealth action that redefined storytelling in games.

title: Castlevania: Symphony of the Night
curated_desc: Defined the Metroidvania genre. Exploration and RPG depth.

title: Chrono Cross
curated_desc: Parallel worlds, 40+ characters, one of the best soundtracks ever.

title: Resident Evil 2
curated_desc: Survival horror perfection. Two characters, four scenarios.

title: Silent Hill
curated_desc: Fog-drenched psychological horror. Atmosphere is unmatched.

title: Spyro the Dragon
curated_desc: Colourful, relaxing collectathon. Perfect handheld game.

title: Spyro 2: Ripto's Rage
curated_desc: Refined everything. More abilities, better worlds.

title: Spyro: Year of the Dragon
curated_desc: Most content, most variety. Great finale.

title: Crash Bandicoot: Warped
curated_desc: The sweet spot of the trilogy. Tight, challenging platforming.

title: Tekken 3
curated_desc: One of the greatest fighting games ever made.

title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 2
curated_desc: Perfect arcade skating. Legendary level design and soundtrack.

title: Xenogears
curated_desc: Mechs, philosophy, religion. Unfinished but unforgettable.

title: Suikoden II
curated_desc: 108 recruitable characters and one of the best villain arcs in RPGs.

title: Vagrant Story
curated_desc: Matsuno's masterpiece. Dense combat and extraordinary writing.

title: Threads of Fate
curated_desc: Two characters, two totally different stories. Charming.

title: Legend of Mana
curated_desc: Watercolour art with freeform world-building. Beautiful and strange.

title: Brave Fencer Musashi
curated_desc: Quirky action adventure with time mechanics. Loads of personality.

title: Parasite Eve
curated_desc: Survival horror meets RPG in Manhattan. Short, stylish, unique.

title: Klonoa: Door to Phantomile
curated_desc: 2.5D platformer with incredible design and a gut-punch ending.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
curated_desc: Regularly cited as the greatest game ever made.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask
curated_desc: Darker, weirder Zelda with a 3-day time loop.

title: Super Mario 64
curated_desc: Invented 3D platforming. Still a joy to play.

title: Banjo-Kazooie
curated_desc: Rare's collectathon masterpiece. Witty and wonderful.

title: Banjo-Tooie
curated_desc: Bigger, more ambitious sequel with interconnected worlds.

title: Paper Mario
curated_desc: Charming, accessible RPG with paper art style.

title: Star Fox 64
curated_desc: Arcadey space combat with branching paths. Endlessly replayable.

title: GoldenEye 007
curated_desc: Defined console FPS multiplayer. Single-player holds up.

title: Perfect Dark
curated_desc: GoldenEye's successor with more features and sci-fi flair.

title: F-Zero X
curated_desc: 30 racers at 60fps. Blazing fast, incredibly tight.

title: Mario Kart 64
curated_desc: The definitive kart racer of the era.

title: Donkey Kong 64
curated_desc: Massive collectathon. Overwhelming but satisfying.

title: Mischief Makers
curated_desc: Shake shake! 2D Treasure platformer, weird and wonderful.

title: Mystical Ninja Starring Goemon
curated_desc: Giant robot battles and pure Japanese absurdity.

title: Sin and Punishment
curated_desc: Treasure's intense on-rails shooter. Japan-only, no Japanese needed.

title: Blast Corps
curated_desc: Destroy buildings for a nuclear missile carrier. Unique and addictive.

title: Chrono Trigger
curated_desc: Often called the greatest RPG ever. Time travel, zero filler.

title: Final Fantasy VI
curated_desc: Ensemble cast, opera scene, Kefka. Peak 2D Final Fantasy.

title: Super Metroid
curated_desc: Atmospheric exploration perfection. Gold standard of the genre.

title: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
curated_desc: The template for top-down Zelda. Light/dark world brilliance.

title: Super Mario World
curated_desc: Arguably the best 2D platformer ever made.

title: Earthbound
curated_desc: Quirky modern-day RPG. Funny, weird, surprisingly dark.

title: Secret of Mana
curated_desc: Co-op action RPG with gorgeous sprites.

title: Super Mario RPG
curated_desc: Mario meets Square. Led to Paper Mario and Mario & Luigi.

title: Donkey Kong Country 2: Diddy's Kong Quest
curated_desc: Peak DKC. Incredible level design and music.

title: Mega Man X
curated_desc: Tighter, faster Mega Man with wall jumps and upgrades.

title: Tactics Ogre: Let Us Cling Together
curated_desc: Deep tactical RPG with branching story. Influenced everything after.

title: Treasure Hunter G
curated_desc: Square tactical RPG (fan translation). Beautiful sprites, unique grid combat.

title: Terranigma
curated_desc: You rebuild civilisation. Ambitious and never released in NA.

title: Streets of Rage 2
curated_desc: Best beat-em-up of the 16-bit era. Incredible soundtrack.

title: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
curated_desc: Sonic at his peak. Speed, great level design, iconic zones.

title: Sonic 3 & Knuckles
curated_desc: The complete Sonic experience. Massive, polished, perfect.

title: Gunstar Heroes
curated_desc: Treasure's non-stop action masterpiece. Creative bosses throughout.
